arr.productName: Labrador cross staff puppy in Birmingham
arr.description: Hi i have a 9 week old little beautiful puppy for sale her name is bear. She is puppy pad trained and has had her injections. She has been microchipped and is the most fluffy and bundle off joy little girl you could get

Very loving kitten for sale, very sweet and playful, needs a loving home, microchipped, fully vaccinated, flead and wormed.she is bengal, main coon, cross Persian.Litter tray, large new cat tree and toys included in price.

Stunning male Scottish fold 18 weeks old, very friendly and good with children. Litter and scratch post trained. Fully vaccinated and up to date with flea and worming. Sadly unable to keep him as my landlord will not let me have cats. Message me for more info

arr.productName: Kittens ready for their forever homes in Dursley
arr.description: We have 5 kittens remaining who are looking for a living family to give them lots of love, play time and care.Very cute, adventurous, playful and litter trained.Contact Trudy

Creamy coloured female pup (purple collar). Yellow female pup (pink collar).Litter of 8 beautiful puppies born to our female lab. Will come with 1st vaccination, vet health check and microchipped. Will have blanket smelling of mum and changeover food

Beautiful Family Labradors, Both mum, Dad are our family pets been reared in our family home since they were puppies. These puppy's have been handled by myself since birth and my 3 young children so perfect family pets. They have been raised around my home so used to the everyday hoovering etc and also have other animals in our home (cat&Parrot)

arr.productName: last girl kitten left. in Southampton
arr.description: this little girl is looking for her forever home. she's very good with her litter tray, eats wet kitten food and kitten milk. very cuddly and loving. she's got such a little personality on her:)
